comments.body:
Am I right in thinking this will always be used as a shared library? If so:
```suggestion
  skip: true  # [win and vc<14]
  run_exports: 
    - {{ pin_subpackage('ceres-solver', max_pin='x.x') }}
```
https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/resources/define-metadata.html?highlight=selectors#export-runtime-requirements

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win and vc<14]
  run_exports: 
    - {{ pin_subpackage('ceres-solver', max_pin='x.x') }}
